reminder_meeting.casualBuddy: 3 PM, bro. Don’t show up late this time, I’ll clown you.
reminder_meeting.caringSibling: Oi! Don’t ditch the 3 PM meeting — I’ll keep bugging you till you go.
reminder_meeting.goodParent: Sweetheart, it’s 3 PM meeting time. Keep calm and do your best.
reminder_meeting.strictProfessional: 3 PM meeting. Be on time. No excuses.
reminder_meeting.wildCard: Guess what’s at 3 PM? Yup, the meeting you’re about to pretend doesn’t exist. Surprise!

reminder_task.casualBuddy: Yo, finish this quick or I’ll paste it on tomorrow again. Don’t be lazy!
reminder_task.caringSibling: Don’t skip this, champ. Knock it out now so you can chill later.
reminder_task.goodParent: Sweetheart, take 20 mins and get this done. You’ll feel lighter.
reminder_task.strictProfessional: This task needs completion now. Proceed.
reminder_task.wildCard: Future-you pinged me: do this now or tomorrow-you cries.

morning_plan.casualBuddy: Mornin’, legend! Here’s your lineup. Don’t fumble it.
morning_plan.caringSibling: Wake up, sleepyhead! I sorted your day — make me proud.
morning_plan.goodParent: Good morning, love. I arranged your day so it feels smooth.
morning_plan.wildCard: Rise and shine. Today’s plan is mildly chaotic — just like us.

explore_event.casualBuddy: Yo, fun thing nearby. Shall we crash?
explore_event.caringSibling: Found a nice event close by. Go peek?
explore_event.goodParent: There’s a nearby event you might enjoy. A little joy helps.
explore_event.strictProfessional: Relevant nearby event detected. Add if aligned.
explore_event.wildCard: Spotted an event next door. Attend or regret stylishly.

nudge_break.casualBuddy: Oi, take a breather before your brain melts.
nudge_break.caringSibling: You’ve been grinding. Stretch, sip, breathe.
nudge_break.goodParent: Darling, short break time. Rest a bit.
nudge_break.wildCard: Pause. Avoid becoming a keyboard goblin.

nudge_drink_water.casualBuddy: Hydrate, hero. No, coffee doesn’t count.
nudge_drink_water.goodParent: Sweetheart, take a sip of water.

exercise_start.casualBuddy: Move it, athlete. 20 minutes, no excuses.
exercise_start.goodParent: Let’s stretch and move gently, sweetheart.
exercise_start.wildCard: Transform mode: ON. Become your final form.

meal_time.casualBuddy: Fuel up. Real food, not vibes.
meal_time.goodParent: Meal time, love. Sit and savor.
meal_time.wildCard: Feeding the genius. Try not to inhale it.

family_call.casualBuddy: Ring the fam. Earn instant karma.
family_call.caringSibling: Quick call home? They’ll love it.
family_call.strictProfessional: Family call scheduled. Place the call.

sleep_winddown.caringSibling: Wind down, champ. You earned it.
sleep_winddown.goodParent: Time to rest, sweetheart. Sleep well.

celebrate_win.caringSibling: Proud of you! Save the glow.
